summary.description:
Today, cooler for the feels like temperature (down 2.9°C) and outside temperature (down 2.1°C) and more moisture-laden outside humidity (up 9%).

Compared to today, yesterday also had noticeable differences in cloud levels (up 807 m) and light levels (up 11814 lux).

The past week and month had observable variation in light levels (up 13806 lux), cloud levels (up 1504 m), feels like temperature (up 4.9°C), and outside temperature (up 3.7°C) when compared to today.

cloud levels.description:
Today’s average cloud levels is 806.9m lower than yesterday, 613.3m lower than the past week, 1503.7m lower than the past month.

The cloud levels yesterday fell between 745m minimum and 3580m maximum, with an average of 1179.6m; weekly and monthly averages were marginally higher at 1792.8m and 2680m.
cloud levels.summary: Partial cloudiness with some periods of sun.

summary.summary: Inside; comfortable and pleasant temperatures. Outside; moderate and mild. Also, neither too dry nor too humid. Drizzle or light rain possible, partial cloudiness with some periods of sun, and light levels will be low during the day. Low pressure may bring unsettled weather.
